short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lock my chrome, need password when open chrome with the profile which enabled this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After installed this extension, your chrome will be protected by a password.
Without inputing the password, the chrome can not be used for each window.
At the first time using after installed, you need set your password after you open a chrome window. and after that, you can login with the password.

If your computed locked or be idle after long time no input(depending on computer setting), you need login again after the computer be actived,
and all your tabs will be covered by a blank layer before you re login in a new tab.

Save your password careful, you can not change the password until next version published.
But you can reset your password by removing the extension and reinstall it.
